# liunx环境配置

# yum

  yum下载不成功，试着更新最新yum或者换yum的源
  去阿里云看操作
  替换yun源为阿里源

  mv /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo.backup
  wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo https://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-7.repo
  yum makecache

# Git

yum直接下载

手动下载最新版本git:
卸载低版本git
yum remove git
安装以下依赖包
yum install gcc
yum install gcc-c++
yum install curl-devel expat-devel gettext-devel openssl-devel zlib-devel
yum install gcc perl-ExtUtils-MakeMaker
下载git压缩包
wget https://github.com/git/git/archive/v2.27.0.tar.gz
解压
tar zxf v2.27.0.tar.gz
进入文件夹
cd git-2.27.0

WARNING

这两行命令貌似没用
make prefix=/usr/local/git all
make prefix=/usr/local/git install

添加到环境变量
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/git/bin" >> /etc/bashrc
source /etc/bashrc

# Node

yum直接下载 yum install nodejs -y 安装node

下载liunx版本node
wget https://nodejs.org/dist/v12.18.0/node-v12.18.0-linux-x64.tar.xz
解压
tar xvf node-v12.18.0-linux-x64.tar.xz
软连接 连接
ln -s /root/node-v12.18.0-linux-x64/bin/node /usr/local/bin/node
ln -s /root/node-v12.18.0-linux-x64/bin/npm /usr/local/bin/npm

按照腾讯云的文档做

# Mysql

参照我的文档

# Nginx

yum install nginx -y 安装nginx 服务器
修改nginx配置文件
vi /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

# redis

yum install redis -y  按照redis
